text: Pierre Laurent Renoudet (June 9, 1935 - September 8, 2024), better known as Peter Renaday, was an American actor and voice actor. He was born in New Iberia, Louisiana. Renaday was best known for being the voice of Master Splinter in the 1987 cartoon Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. He was also known for his roles in The Batman Superman Movie: World's Finest, The Lion King II: Simba's Pride, Antz (1998), The Odd Couple II (1998), Mulan (1998), The Prince of Egypt (1998), Ringmaster (1998), Scooby-Doo! and the Witch's Ghost (1999), The Road to El Dorado (2000), Shrek (2001), Madagascar (2005) and The Princess and the Frog (2009). Renaday died at his home in Burbank, California on September 8, 2024 at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Peter Renaday at Behind the Voice Actors Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American voice actors Category:American radio actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Louisiana
